item.description:
Have a piece of Zen and relaxation with Tai Chi or excitement of Kung Fu! Cerebrate one of our partner, Huan’s Tai Chi’s Grand Opening at YWCA( 1 block from Red line ( central Square)) by joining them on April 1st to learn Self-defense/Kung Fu, Tai Chi, and Qi Kung, .

Meet their new instructors such as martial arts teacher Yu Lu Tian From Mainland China, Joseph Gallop and Jing Wang whom has been teaching Tai Chi for University of Massachusetts Boston. Their class schedule can be found at http://www.huanstaichi.com/index.php?page=class



Tai Chi & Kung Fu Classes

MON 1st
7:00 - 8:00 pm Tan Tui Kung Fu（精武门潭腿） and Self-Defense Taught by Joseph G. and Yu Lu Tian
8:00 -9:00 pm Beginner Tai Chi Joseph G.
item.name: Zen and relaxation with Tai Chi
